com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.sync

Class PVPData.TotalPVPEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.sync.PVPData.TotalPVPEntry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataStore.NormalData
    Enclosing class:
    PVPData

    public class PVPData.TotalPVPEntry
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataStore.NormalData
    Represents an entry in the PVP data store. It is dynamic, i.e. it can be edited once it has been created.
    Author:
    bitWolfy

      PVPData.TotalPVPEntry(int playerId, int victimId, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack weapon)

      Creates a new TotalPVP object based on the killer and victim in question
